features: SURE-CRISP AIR FRY FUNCTION EVENLY COOKS AND BROWNS FOODS FOR A CRISP FINISH: Sure-Crisp convection evenly cooks foods and browns foods with little or no oil, making this air fryer toaster oven ideal for fries, chicken wings, vegetables, and more.

EASY REACH OVEN DOOR PROVIDES EASY ACCESS TO FOODS AND COUNTERTOP: The specially designed glass door on the toaster oven air fryer combo makes it easier to add and remove foods from the oven. It's also easy to check foods as they're cooking.

PLENTY OF COOKING SPACE AND 2 RACK POSITIONS: This toaster oven has plenty of room for 6 slices of toast, a 12" pizza, or a 9" x 11" baking pan. It has 2 rack positions to accommodate a variety of foods. Slide-out crumb tray for easy cleanup
COOK YOUR WAY WITH 4 COOKING FUNCTIONS AND 1400 WATTS OF POWER: Toast, air fry, bake or broil in this versatile toaster oven. It has 1400 watts of cooking power.

COMBINES THE BEST FEATURES OF AN AIR FRYER AND EASY REACH TOASTER OVEN: This air fryer* oven gives you the convenience of the Hamilton Beach Easy Reach Toaster Oven, combined with the functionality of our Sure-Crisp Air Fryer.

30-MINUTE TIMER WITH STAY-ON SETTING, AUTO SHUTOFF, AND READY BELL: The 30-minute timer with ready bell helps you keep track of cooking time. The Stay On setting makes it easy to extend cooking time when needed, while automatic shutoff provides peace of mind.
body.description: The Hamilton Beach® Easy Reach® Sure-Crisp® Air Fryer Toaster Oven combines the convenience of our popular Easy Reach Toaster Oven with Sure-Crisp air frying functionality,* for evenly cooked, browned and crisp foods with little to no oil.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: You can toast, bake, broil and air fry right on your countertop. Using little to no oil, our Sure-Crisp technology evenly cooks, browns and crisps all kinds of foods: fries, chicken wings, steaks, fish, vegetables, and more. With 1400 watts of cooking power and 2 rack positions, the oven accommodates a variety of foods.

Hamilton Beach products are thoughtfully designed to make your life easier. We use consumer insights, in-depth research to deliver the best solution to your everyday needs. Whether it's preparing delicious meals and beverages effortlessly, or making your clothes look their best, you can count on the brand that has spent over 100 years creating products with you in mind. Hamilton Beach Sure-Crisp Air Fryer Toaster Oven with Easy Reach Door, 6 Slice Capacity, Stainless Steel Air powerfully circulates* for evenly browned foods with little to no oil The Hamilton Beach Easy Reach Sure-Crisp Air Fryer Toaster Oven combines the convenience of our popular Easy Reach Toaster Oven with Sure-Crisp air frying functionality.* You get the countertop cooking convenience you love in a toaster oven, plus the even crisping and browning of an air fryer. The specially designed glass door makes it easy to add and remove foods from the oven, check foods as they're cooking, and keeps the countertop free. Air powerfully circulates for evenly browned foods with little to no oil Fits 6 slices of toast, a 12" pizza, or a 9" x 11" baking pan Auto shutoff, 30-minute timer, ready bell, and Stay On setting Includes metal mesh basket for air frying, bake pan, broil rack, and slide-out crumb tray *Air fry feature may require more cooking time than standalone air fryers

Features: Evenly Cooks and Browns Foods Sure-Crisp convection evenly cooks and browns foods with little or no oil, making it ideal for fries, chicken wings, steaks, fish, vegetables, and more. Easy Reach Roll-Top Door The specially designed glass door makes it easier to add and remove foods from the oven, and provides easy access to the countertop. It's also easy to check foods as they're cooking. Plenty of Cooking Space This toaster oven has plenty of room for 6 slices of toast, a 12" pizza, or a 9" x 11" baking pan. It has 2 rack positions to accommodate a variety of foods.

4 Cooking Functions Toast, air fry, bake or broil in this versatile toaster oven. It has 1400 watts of cooking power. Do More with Less You get the convenience and cooking functionality of the Hamilton Beach Easy Reach Toaster Oven and an air fryer* combined into 1 space-saving appliance. Useful Built-In Features The 30-minute timer with ready bell helps you keep track of cooking time. The Stay On setting makes it easy to extend cooking time when needed, while automatic shutoff provides peace of mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We no longer have to wait for our regular oven to preheat and now we can cook and heat food in half the time. I would buy again. It cooked a frozen pizza last night and it turn out excellent cooking top and bottom of pizza.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally Found A Decent Toaster Oven
reviews.reviewText: First of all let me get this out of the way: This is not in any way, shape or form an air fryer. It is, however, a very nice toaster oven. Controls are a bit complex to use. Very easy to clean. Large capacity. I easily fit a rectangular Totino's pizza in it and used the "Air Fryer" option. It actually took longer to cook than normally, but the result was a perfectly done pizza with a great crisp crust. And I didn't have to heat up my kitchen with my big oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works, arrived in wet box USPS
reviews.reviewText: 2nd oven I've ordered, different brand before, arrived with 3 dents. Returned.This arrived in wet box. See pictures. Oven is ok so far. Packaged very well had to have help getting out of box packaged so tightly and well.All components included and fit correctly. Glass door moves up and down smoothly.Unit does get overly warm outside and could burn skin. But handle doesn't. Plug is short, works for me but maybe not some kitchens. Dials work smoothly and are clear. Followed instructions and pre heated to remove new smell, wasn't a strong odor. Washed pans and basket in hot soapy water as instructed. Just received it 2 days ago. I'll send new review after some use. I'm 85 and bought to cook toast, warm leftovers and not have to use my big oven. Thinking HB has improved quality from older bad reviews several years ago.I'll see as I use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent design feature with the roll up door
reviews.reviewText: I'm extremely happy with this toaster oven. For me it's eliminated the need for a full size oven. It's small and compact, but it has an amazing capacity. It works perfectly for toasting and baking so far. Appears to be easy to clean. And I LOVE the roll up door, which not only frees up counter space for access, but makes access much easier. Very pleased with this purchase. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good for toasting and air fryer! Has a window so you can see what’s going on in there. Unlike my last air fryer which what was going on inside was a mystery! 5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The whole family likes this easy to use and easy to clean appliance. It is large, but made to not look bulky on the counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Do Not Buy As Air Fryer
reviews.reviewText: I will cut to the chase: this is not an air fryer, just a convection oven. I used it to air fry potatoes and chicken drumsticks. The potatoes came out a little soggy after 40 minutes, similar to results from convection baking. The chicken drumsticks also lacked crispness, again more like convection baking. The bake and toast functions work well. The timer is however limited to 30 minutes so you will need to reset the timer if you need more than 30 minutes. The dials are rotary and lacked precise markings for accurate settings. The interior space is ample though, and more than adequate for a 12" pizza. The price is right for a good toaster and convection oven. However, if you want a truly good air fryer, look elsewhere and prepare to pay more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to get a new toaster but also an air fryer. So this really came in handy. Love it and will take good care of it. I can heat up my food without turning on my over. I can bake and air fry, definitely dope.
Use this every day! I do prefer making some things in the oven still, but I have definitely used this more than the oven now. Makes great frozen fries and pizza!

Il semble que j'aie enfin trouvé mon four grille-pain après en avoir retourné 3 avec fonctions numériques !Celui-ci n'est pas numérique et cela me réjouit. J'aime la simplicité de ce petit four, mais ce qui me plaît particulièrement : le fait que la porte s'ouvre toute grande, comme si elle disparaissait devant nos yeux. C'est génial ! Elle s'ouvre sur le dessus et cela facilite grandement l'accès, c'est juste formidable ! Également, la grandeur est très bien. Je le conserve et j'espère pouvoir l'utiliser des années à venir ! Je le recommande.
Insufficient clearance from top of air fryer basket to roof of unit, restricting cooking larger items. The timer only goes up to 30 minutes, requiring manual re-set if the food needs longer to cook.

reviews.reviewTitle: came with the damage I had to return
reviews.reviewText: came with the damage, I had to return

I bought one, the heater stopped working with in a week, got it replaced, that one stopped working soon. The fan is poor, it does not push the heat out, and fan is on the side, not on the top, creating uneven heating
